verbs.description: [ARG1: iranian oil exports] [V: fall] [ARG4: to 1 6 million barrels a day] iranian crude exports are falling as countries begin to get in line with u s sanctions according to the u s energy information administration in september iran exported 1 6 million barrels per day down from 2 7 million barrels per day in june danang iran da nang electronic industries alliance u s energy information administration u s washington 1 6 million barrels eia apec vietnam donald trump vladimir putin president president donald trump russia
